data.content:
Gangplank: The Saltwater Scourge

Gangplank is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game, League of Legends. He was released on August 19, 2009, and has since become a beloved and iconic character in the game's extensive roster of champions. With his pirate-themed abilities and swashbuckling playstyle, Gangplank offers a unique and exciting experience for players.

The Story of Gangplank

Gangplank, whose real name is Vincent, was born and raised in the city of Bilgewater, a lawless port town known for its cutthroat pirates and treacherous waters. From a young age, Gangplank was drawn to the sea and the thrill of adventure. He quickly became a skilled sailor and a formidable fighter, earning a reputation as a fearsome pirate captain.

However, Gangplank's rise to power was not without its challenges. He faced rival pirate crews, dangerous sea monsters, and even the wrath of the powerful sea witch, Illaoi. Despite these obstacles, Gangplank's determination and cunning allowed him to overcome each trial, solidifying his position as the ruler of Bilgewater.

But Gangplank's reign was not destined to last. His arrogance and greed led to his downfall when his former ally, Miss Fortune, orchestrated a coup against him. Gangplank was left for dead, his ship destroyed, and his crew scattered. However, he managed to survive and vowed to reclaim his throne and exact revenge on those who betrayed him.

With a new ship, the Dreadnova, and a burning desire for vengeance, Gangplank returned to Bilgewater. He rallied his loyal followers and set out to reclaim his position as the ruler of the city. The battle for Bilgewater was fierce, but Gangplank's cunning tactics and ruthless determination allowed him to emerge victorious.

Now, Gangplank rules over Bilgewater once again, his iron grip ensuring that the city remains under his control. He is feared and respected by both his allies and enemies, and his legend continues to grow with each passing day.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Gangplank is a versatile champion with a unique set of strengths and weaknesses. His primary strength lies in his ability to deal massive amounts of damage from a distance, making him a formidable threat in team fights and skirmishes. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot a bullet that deals bonus damage and applies on-hit effects, making it a potent tool for harassing enemies and farming minions.

Another strength of Gangplank is his ability to control the battlefield with his E ability, Powder Keg. This ability allows him to place barrels that can be detonated, dealing area-of-effect damage and slowing enemies. Skilled Gangplank players can strategically position barrels to zone enemies and create opportunities for their team to engage or disengage from fights.

However, Gangplank also has his fair share of weaknesses. One of his main weaknesses is his lack of mobility. Unlike some other champions, Gangplank does not have a dash or blink ability, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control. Additionally, Gangplank's ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, has a long cooldown, limiting his ability to impact fights on a regular basis.

Furthermore, Gangplank's early game can be challenging. He is relatively weak in the early levels and can struggle against aggressive laners. However, as the game progresses and Gangplank acquires items, he becomes a formidable force that can carry his team to victory.

Gangplank in the Game

Gangplank is primarily played in the top lane, where his ability to farm safely from a distance and scale into the late game makes him a popular pick. However, he can also be played in the mid lane or as a support in certain situations.

In the early game, Gangplank focuses on farming and surviving in the laning phase. He uses his Q ability to last-hit minions and harass his opponent when the opportunity arises. Gangplank players must carefully manage their mana and barrels to maximize their damage output and control the lane.

As the game progresses, Gangplank becomes a potent split-pusher and team fighter. His ability to clear waves quickly with his barrels allows him to apply pressure in side lanes while his ultimate can turn the tide of team fights across the map. Gangplank players must have good map awareness and decision-making skills to make the most of their global presence.

One of the most exciting aspects of Gangplank is his ability to upgrade his ultimate, Cannon Barrage, with Silver Serpents. These serpents are earned by successfully killing minions with his Q ability or by participating in takedowns. Each upgrade enhances the power of his ultimate, making it even more devastating in team fights.

Overall, Gangplank is a high-risk, high-reward champion that rewards skilled players with his immense damage and playmaking potential. His pirate theme and captivating lore make him a fan-favorite among League of Legends players, and his unique gameplay mechanics ensure that he remains a popular pick in the game.

Explore Gangplank's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Gangplank's skins. From the classic Captain Gangplank to the fearsome Dreadnova Gangplank, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the traditional pirate look or want to embrace the cosmic power of the Dreadnova, our website has you covered.

By visiting our Gangplank page, you can explore the different skins, learn about their release dates, and watch videos to see them in action. We strive to provide comprehensive and up-to-date information for all League of Legends champions and their skins, ensuring that players have access to the latest content and can make informed decisions about their in-game purchases.

So, set sail with Gangplank and experience the thrill of being a pirate captain in the world of League of Legends. With his swashbuckling abilities and captivating lore, Gangplank is sure to leave a lasting impression on both new and seasoned players alike.

Gangplank (Dreadnova Gangplank)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 2, 2017

Gangplank, the terror of the high seas, has donned a fearsome new outfit with the release of his Dreadnova Gangplank skin. This skin transforms the Bilgewater pirate into a formidable space-faring captain, ready to conquer the cosmos with his deadly arsenal. With its intricate design and attention to detail, Dreadnova Gangplank is a must-have skin for any Gangplank enthusiast.

The Dreadnova Gangplank skin features a complete visual overhaul, giving the champion a futuristic and menacing appearance. Gangplank's traditional pirate attire is replaced with a sleek, black and gold space suit, adorned with intricate mechanical details. His iconic hat is replaced with a futuristic helmet, complete with a glowing visor that adds an extra touch of intimidation. The skin also includes new animations, sound effects, and voice lines, further immersing players into the cosmic world of Dreadnova Gangplank.

One of the standout features of Dreadnova Gangplank is his weapon, a massive energy-infused cannon that replaces his traditional pistol. This cannon is a sight to behold, with its glowing blue energy and intricate mechanical components. With each shot, the cannon unleashes devastating energy blasts, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake. The skin also includes unique particle effects for Gangplank's abilities, adding an extra layer of visual flair to his gameplay.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gangplank and how he fits into the world of League of Legends. Gangplank, also known as the Saltwater Scourge, is a feared pirate captain hailing from the lawless port city of Bilgewater. He is a ruthless and cunning leader, commanding a fleet of pirate ships and terrorizing the seas. Gangplank's ultimate goal is to become the undisputed ruler of Bilgewater, and he will stop at nothing to achieve his ambitions.

In the game, Gangplank is a versatile champion who excels at both ranged and melee combat. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, empowers his next basic attack with bonus damage and sets his enemies ablaze. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot a ranged attack that applies on-hit effects and refunds mana if it kills the target. Gangplank's W ability, Remove Scurvy, cleanses him of all crowd control effects and heals him, making him a difficult target to lock down. His E ability, Powder Keg, places barrels that can be detonated to deal area of effect damage and slow enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship, dealing damage and slowing enemies in the targeted area.

Gangplank's strengths lie in his ability to deal massive damage from a safe distance, thanks to his Q ability. He can poke down enemies and secure kills with his ranged attacks, making him a formidable threat in the laning phase. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, allows him to impact fights across the map, providing global presence and utility to his team.

However, Gangplank also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to all-ins and ganks. His abilities also require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness, making him a challenging champion to master. Additionally, Gangplank's power spikes heavily rely on his ability to farm and accumulate gold, as his upgrades through his ultimate ability, Raise Morale, are purchased with silver serpents earned from last-hitting minions with Parrrley.

In conclusion, Dreadnova Gangplank is a visually stunning skin that brings a fresh and exciting look to the champion. With its futuristic design and unique particle effects, this skin is a must-have for Gangplank enthusiasts and collectors alike. Whether you're a fan of the champion's lore or simply enjoy dominating the high seas, Dreadnova Gangplank is sure to make a statement on the Rift.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Gangplank's appearances, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the champion.

Gangplank (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain in the popular online multiplayer game, League of Legends. As one of the original champions in the game, Gangplank has become an iconic figure, known for his ruthless nature and his mastery of the high seas. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Gangplank's default costume and explore all the intricate details of this iconic skin.

The Story Behind Gangplank's Default Costume

Gangplank's default costume represents his signature look as a pirate captain. He is depicted wearing a tattered red coat adorned with gold trimmings, a tricorn hat with a skull and crossbones emblem, and a menacing eye patch. His rugged appearance perfectly captures his ruthless and cunning nature, as he sails the treacherous waters in search of plunder and power.

The default costume showcases Gangplank's status as the leader of the Bilgewater pirate crew. The intricate details of his outfit, such as the weathered fabric and the worn-out leather boots, reflect the harsh life he leads as a pirate. The gold accents on his coat and hat symbolize his wealth and influence, earned through countless raids and conquests.

Furthermore, Gangplank's default costume features various accessories that highlight his pirate persona. He carries a wicked-looking cutlass, a weapon he wields with deadly precision. His belt is adorned with pouches and trinkets, containing tools and treasures collected during his adventures. These small details add depth to his character and enhance the overall aesthetic of the skin.

Gangplank's Story and Role in League of Legends

Gangplank's story in League of Legends is intertwined with the lore of Bilgewater, a lawless port city known for its pirates and smugglers. Once the reigning king of Bilgewater, Gangplank was presumed dead after a mutiny led by his first mate, Miss Fortune. However, he returned from the brink of death, seeking revenge and reclaiming his throne.

As a champion, Gangplank is classified as a melee fighter and excels in dealing damage from both close and long range. His abilities revolve around his pirate theme, allowing him to shoot enemies with his pistol, set barrels on fire, and unleash a devastating cannon barrage. Gangplank's playstyle requires a mix of strategic positioning, timing, and resource management, making him a challenging but rewarding champion to master.

Despite his formidable strength, Gangplank does have weaknesses. He lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, his reliance on barrels for damage can be countered by opponents who can destroy or disable them quickly. However, skilled Gangplank players can overcome these weaknesses through careful planning and precise execution.

In the world of League of Legends, Gangplank holds a significant place as one of the game's original champions. His lore and character development have been expanded upon through various in-game events, cinematics, and stories. Players can explore his rich backstory and witness his interactions with other champions, such as Miss Fortune and Twisted Fate, through these immersive experiences.

Explore Gangplank's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Gangplank in League of Legends. From his default costume to his various skins, each iteration of Gangplank offers a unique visual experience that complements his gameplay and personality. Whether you prefer the classic look of the default costume or the thematic designs of his alternate skins, Gangplank's appearances are sure to impress both fans and newcomers alike.

So, dive into the world of Gangplank and discover the Saltwater Scourge's captivating story and his many appearances in League of Legends!

Gangplank (Minuteman Gangplank)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: July 1, 2015

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain in the world of League of Legends. Known for his ruthless nature and cunning tactics, Gangplank has become a fan-favorite champion with a rich lore and a wide range of skins to choose from. One of his most iconic and visually striking skins is

Released on July 1, 2015, Minuteman Gangplank is a skin that pays homage to the American Revolutionary War and the Minutemen, who were civilian colonists ready to fight at a minute's notice. This skin transforms Gangplank into a patriotic pirate captain, donning a tricorn hat, a red coat, and a white wig. His trusty cutlass is replaced with a musket, and his pistol is now a flintlock pistol. The skin also features unique visual effects, such as gunpowder smoke and firework-like explosions.

Minuteman Gangplank is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. It offers players a chance to experience Gangplank's pirate persona in a different historical context, adding a touch of Americana to the champion's already impressive repertoire of skins.

Gangplank's Story and Abilities

Gangplank's story in League of Legends is one of treachery, revenge, and the pursuit of power. Once the ruler of Bilgewater, a lawless port city, Gangplank was betrayed by his closest ally, Miss Fortune, and left for dead. However, he miraculously survived and returned to seek vengeance on those who had wronged him.

As a champion, Gangplank is a versatile fighter who excels at both ranged and melee combat. His abilities revolve around dealing damage, crowd control, and area denial. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, empowers his next basic attack with bonus damage and sets the target on fire, dealing additional damage over time. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot a target with his pistol, dealing damage and potentially granting bonus gold if it kills the target.

Gangplank's W ability, Remove Scurvy, cleanses him of all crowd control effects and heals him, making him a resilient and hard-to-kill champion. His E ability, Powder Keg, allows him to place barrels on the ground that can be detonated with his basic attacks or abilities, dealing damage in an area and slowing enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship, damaging enemies and slowing them.

Gangplank's strengths lie in his ability to deal high burst damage, control the battlefield with his barrels, and provide global map pressure with his ultimate. His versatility allows him to adapt to different playstyles, whether it be as a split-pusher, a teamfighter, or a duelist. However, Gangplank's weaknesses include his lack of mobility and his vulnerability to crowd control. He relies heavily on positioning and timing to maximize his damage output and survivability.

Gangplank's Place in the Game

Gangplank has been a staple pick in the top lane and occasionally in the mid lane for many seasons. His ability to farm safely from a distance with his Q ability and his global presence with his ultimate make him a valuable asset to any team. Gangplank's late-game scaling is particularly noteworthy, as he can become a devastating force with his high damage output and area control.

However, Gangplank's popularity and effectiveness have fluctuated over the years due to balance changes and shifts in the meta. He has seen periods of dominance where he was a must-pick in competitive play, as well as times when he fell out of favor due to nerfs or meta shifts. Nevertheless, Gangplank remains a beloved champion among players who enjoy his unique playstyle and the satisfaction of landing explosive barrel combos.

On this page, you can find detailed information about Gangplank's various appearances and skins, including Minuteman Gangplank. You can also watch videos showcasing his abilities, gameplay, and strategies to help you master this fearsome pirate captain.

Whether you're a fan of Gangplank's lore, his gameplay, or simply enjoy the thrill of playing a pirate, Minuteman Gangplank is a skin that offers a unique and visually appealing experience. So set sail, raise the Jolly Roger, and unleash the fury of the Saltwater Scourge with this patriotic pirate skin!

Gangplank (Sultan Gangplank)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 10, 2015

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain known for his ruthless nature and cunning tactics. With his iconic appearance and unique abilities, Gangplank has become a beloved champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. One of his most striking and sought-after skins is the

costume, which adds a touch of regal elegance to this notorious pirate.

Released on August 10, 2015, the Sultan Gangplank skin offers players a chance to experience Gangplank's pirate persona in a whole new light. This skin transforms him into a majestic sultan, adorned with luxurious robes, a golden turban, and intricate jewelry. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, with every aspect carefully designed to capture the essence of a powerful and wealthy ruler.

The Sultan Gangplank skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. This price may vary depending on regional and promotional discounts, but it is a reasonable cost considering the level of craftsmanship and the unique visual experience it offers. Players who choose to unlock this skin will not only enhance their gameplay but also enjoy the satisfaction of commanding the high seas as a formidable sultan.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Gangplank and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gangplank's lore is rich and captivating, making him a compelling character to explore. Born in the city of Bilgewater, Gangplank rose to power through sheer force and cunning. He became the leader of the notorious gang known as the Dreadnova, ruling the criminal underworld with an iron fist.

However, Gangplank's reign of terror was challenged when Miss Fortune, a rival pirate, sought to overthrow him and reclaim Bilgewater. In a climactic battle, Gangplank was seemingly killed, and Bilgewater rejoiced at the fall of their tyrant. But fate had other plans for Gangplank, as he returned from the dead, seeking vengeance against those who had betrayed him.

Gangplank's return marked a turning point in his story, as he became a champion in the League of Legends. With his unique abilities and strategic prowess, Gangplank quickly established himself as a formidable force on the Fields of Justice. His ultimate ability,

allows him to rain down cannonballs on his enemies, creating chaos and disruption on the battlefield.

As a champion, Gangplank possesses both strengths and weaknesses. His strengths lie in his ability to deal massive damage from a distance, making him a formidable threat to squishy targets. His Q ability,

allows him to shoot his enemies with his pistol, dealing bonus damage and potentially granting him extra gold. This ability not only helps him secure kills but also accelerates his gold income, giving him an advantage over his opponents.

However, Gangplank's weaknesses lie in his lack of mobility and vulnerability to crowd control. He relies heavily on positioning and careful decision-making to maximize his damage output while avoiding enemy threats. Additionally, his ultimate ability has a long cooldown, requiring him to use it strategically to have the greatest impact on team fights.

In the world of League of Legends, Gangplank holds a special place as a champion with a captivating story and a unique playstyle. Whether you're a fan of his ruthless pirate persona or simply enjoy his gameplay mechanics, Gangplank offers a thrilling experience for players of all skill levels.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Gangplank's appearances, including the Sultan Gangplank skin. Explore the different facets of this notorious pirate and discover the many ways you can dominate the high seas with Gangplank's arsenal of abilities.

Gangplank (Captain Gangplank)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 5, 2015

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain who roams the high seas in search of treasure and glory. With his iconic skin, Captain Gangplank, he takes on a more commanding and authoritative appearance, embodying the true essence of a pirate captain.

Captain Gangplank is a legendary skin that was released on August 5, 2015, as part of the Bilgewater: Burning Tides event. This event introduced a new storyline to the League of Legends universe, centered around the pirate-infested city of Bilgewater. Gangplank, being one of the most notorious pirates in the game, received this special skin to commemorate his role in the event.

The Captain Gangplank skin transforms the Saltwater Scourge into a formidable pirate captain, complete with a regal captain's hat, a luxurious red coat adorned with gold trimmings, and a menacing cutlass. The skin also features unique visual and sound effects, giving Gangplank a more commanding presence on the battlefield.

As a pirate captain, Gangplank is known for his ruthless nature and his ability to command his crew with an iron fist. He is a melee champion who excels at dealing damage from a distance and disrupting enemy formations. With his Q ability, Parrrley, Gangplank shoots a bullet from his pistol, dealing bonus damage and applying on-hit effects. His W ability, Remove Scurvy, allows him to cleanse himself of crowd control effects and heal a portion of his missing health. Gangplank's E ability, Powder Keg, places barrels on the ground that can be detonated to deal area of effect damage and slow enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship, damaging and slowing enemies in a large area.

Gangplank's story in the League of Legends universe is a tale of treachery, revenge, and redemption. Once the ruler of Bilgewater, Gangplank was overthrown by his own crew and left for dead. However, he managed to survive and returned to reclaim his throne, seeking vengeance on those who betrayed him. With his newfound power and the support of his loyal crew, Gangplank became a force to be reckoned with in Bilgewater.

In the game, Gangplank is a versatile champion who can be played in multiple roles, including top lane and mid lane. His high damage output and crowd control abilities make him a formidable opponent in team fights, while his global ultimate allows him to assist his teammates from anywhere on the map. However, Gangplank's lack of mobility and vulnerability to crowd control effects can make him an easy target if caught out of position.

On this page, you can find all the information and videos about Gangplank's various appearances, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the commanding presence of Captain Gangplank or the rugged look of the Saltwater Scourge, there is a skin for every pirate enthusiast.

Gangplank (Toy Soldier Gangplank)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: December 10, 2014

Gangplank, the notorious pirate captain of Bilgewater, has always been a fearsome and intimidating figure on the Rift. With his ruthless nature and cunning tactics, he strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. However, there is a side to Gangplank that many may not be aware of - a playful and whimsical side that is brought to life in his

skin.

Released on December 10, 2014, the

skin offers a unique and delightful twist to the character. In this skin, Gangplank is transformed into a charming toy soldier, complete with a vibrant red and gold uniform, a toy sword, and a comically oversized hat. This skin truly captures the essence of a playful and mischievous Gangplank, adding a touch of lightheartedness to his otherwise menacing persona.

The attention to detail in the

skin is truly remarkable. From the intricate stitching on his uniform to the carefully crafted toy sword, every aspect of this skin is designed to immerse players in the whimsical world of toy soldiers. Even his iconic pistol has been transformed into a toy gun, complete with a cork at the end. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects, further enhancing the playful nature of the character.

But what is the story behind this delightful skin? How did Gangplank, the fearsome pirate, become a toy soldier? Unfortunately, Riot Games has not provided an official lore or backstory for the

skin. However, we can speculate on the origins of this playful costume.

One theory is that Gangplank stumbled upon a hidden treasure chest during one of his many adventures. Inside the chest, he discovered a magical toy soldier figurine. As soon as he picked it up, he found himself transformed into a toy soldier, complete with the vibrant uniform and oversized hat. Despite his initial confusion, Gangplank quickly embraced his new form and realized the advantages it brought. With his newfound toy soldier powers, he could infiltrate enemy lines undetected and unleash chaos among his foes.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gangplank himself. In the world of League of Legends, Gangplank hails from the lawless port city of Bilgewater. He is the ruthless captain of the dread pirate crew known as the

With his ship, the Dead Pool, he terrorizes the high seas, plundering and pillaging as he pleases.

Gangplank is known for his brutal and cunning nature. He is a master of strategy and manipulation, always staying one step ahead of his enemies. With his trusty pistol and his deadly sword, he strikes fear into the hearts of those who dare to cross his path.

However, Gangplank's story took a dramatic turn during the

event. In a shocking twist, Gangplank was seemingly killed by his rival, Miss Fortune, and the city of Bilgewater celebrated his demise. But Gangplank, being the resourceful pirate that he is, managed to survive and returned to Bilgewater seeking revenge.

With his return, Gangplank became even more ruthless and determined to reclaim his position as the ruler of Bilgewater. He launched a full-scale assault on the city, seeking to eliminate his enemies and regain control. This event, known as the

showcased the true power and resilience of the pirate captain.

In terms of gameplay, Gangplank is a versatile champion who excels in both melee combat and ranged attacks. He has the ability to harass his opponents from a distance with his pistol, while also being able to engage in close-quarters combat with his sword. Gangplank's ultimate ability,

allows him to rain down cannonballs on a targeted area, dealing damage and slowing enemies.

Despite his strengths, Gangplank also has his weaknesses. He is relatively squishy and lacks mobility, making him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Additionally, his abilities require precise timing and positioning to maximize their effectiveness, making him a challenging champion to master.

Overall, Gangplank is a formidable and iconic champion in the world of League of Legends. His

skin adds a touch of whimsy and playfulness to his character, showcasing a different side to the fearsome pirate captain. Whether you prefer the ruthless pirate or the playful toy soldier, Gangplank offers a unique and enjoyable gameplay experience.

For more information about Gangplank and his various appearances, including the
skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch the champion spotlight videos. Explore the depths of Bilgewater and unleash your inner pirate with Gangplank!

Gangplank (FPX Gangplank)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: November 10, 2019

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain who roams the high seas in search of treasure and glory. With his trusty pistol and a thirst for power, Gangplank strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies. As one of the original champions in League of Legends, Gangplank has undergone various transformations and received numerous skins over the years. One of his most notable and sought-after skins is the FPX Gangplank skin.

The FPX Gangplank skin was released on November 10, 2019, as part of the collaboration between Riot Games and FunPlus Phoenix (FPX), the winners of the 2019 League of Legends World Championship. This skin celebrates FPX's victory and pays homage to their incredible performance during the tournament. It is available for purchase in the in-game store for 1350 RP.

FPX Gangplank features a unique and striking design that captures the essence of both Gangplank and FPX. The skin showcases Gangplank in a new outfit, adorned with FPX's signature colors and logo. His iconic pirate hat is replaced with a sleek black helmet, and his traditional pirate attire is replaced with a futuristic armor, complete with FPX branding. The skin also includes new visual effects, animations, and sound effects that add an extra layer of immersion to the gameplay experience.

When playing as FPX Gangplank, every ability and attack feels more impactful and visually appealing. His Q ability, Parrrley, fires a futuristic laser beam instead of a bullet, while his W ability, Remove Scurvy, emits a burst of blue energy upon activation. His E ability, Powder Keg, creates explosive barrels with FPX branding, and his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, rains down futuristic artillery strikes on his enemies.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gangplank and his place in the League of Legends universe. Gangplank hails from the port city of Bilgewater, a lawless and treacherous place where pirates and outlaws thrive. He was once the ruler of Bilgewater, commanding a fearsome fleet known as the Dreadnova. However, his reign was challenged by Miss Fortune, a rival pirate seeking revenge for her family's murder. In a brutal battle, Gangplank was seemingly killed, and Miss Fortune took control of Bilgewater.

But Gangplank's story doesn't end there. Through dark magic and the help of the undead pirate captain, Nagakabouros, Gangplank returned from the dead, seeking vengeance against those who betrayed him. With his newfound powers and a burning desire for revenge, Gangplank set out to reclaim his throne and regain control of Bilgewater.

In the game, Gangplank is a versatile top lane champion who excels at dealing damage from a distance and controlling the battlefield. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, empowers his next basic attack and sets his enemies ablaze. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot his pistol at a target, dealing bonus damage and applying on-hit effects. His W ability, Remove Scurvy, cleanses Gangplank of crowd control effects and heals him, making him a resilient fighter. His E ability, Powder Keg, places barrels that can be detonated to deal area-of-effect damage and slow enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship, damaging and slowing enemies in a large area.

Gangplank's strengths lie in his ability to poke and harass enemies from a safe distance, thanks to his Q ability. He can also control the battlefield with his barrels, zoning enemies and setting up devastating chain explosions. His ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, provides global map presence and can turn the tide of team fights. However, Gangplank is relatively squishy and vulnerable to all-ins, especially early in the game. He relies heavily on his barrels for damage, making him predictable and susceptible to counterplay.

Overall, Gangplank is a high-risk, high-reward champion who requires skill and strategy to master. His unique playstyle and lore make him a beloved character among League of Legends players. Whether you're a fan of his pirate theme or a follower of FPX's victorious journey, the FPX Gangplank skin is a must-have for any Gangplank enthusiast.

On this page, you can find more information about Gangplank, including his other skins, abilities, and gameplay videos. Explore the world of Gangplank and set sail on a thrilling adventure in the League of Legends universe!

Gangplank (Sailor Gangplank)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 5, 2015

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a fearsome pirate captain who roams the high seas in search of treasure and adventure. With his iconic appearance and ruthless nature, Gangplank has become a beloved champion in the popular online game, League of Legends. One of his most notable skins is

which offers a unique twist to his character and adds a touch of nautical charm to his pirate persona.

Sailor Gangplank is a skin that transforms the pirate captain into a dashing sailor, complete with a crisp white uniform, a captain's hat adorned with a skull and crossbones, and a stylish blue coat. The skin also features a new model for his trusty weapon, the Parrrley pistol, which is now designed to resemble an elegant flintlock pistol. Additionally, his abilities and animations have been modified to match the theme, giving players a refreshing and immersive experience.

Released on August 5, 2015, Sailor Gangplank quickly became a fan favorite among League of Legends players. The skin perfectly captures the essence of a swashbuckling sailor, combining the ruggedness of a pirate with the elegance of a naval officer. It offers a visually appealing alternative to Gangplank's default appearance, allowing players to showcase their love for the character in a unique way.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gangplank and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game. Gangplank is a champion known for his versatility and high damage output. He excels in both close combat and ranged attacks, making him a formidable opponent in any situation. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, empowers his next basic attack with bonus damage and sets his enemies ablaze, dealing additional damage over time.

Gangplank's Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot his pistol at a target, dealing damage and applying on-hit effects. If the target is killed with Parrrley, Gangplank gains bonus gold, making him a master at farming and accumulating wealth. His W ability, Remove Scurvy, cleanses Gangplank of all crowd control effects and heals him, providing much-needed sustain in battles.

The E ability, Powder Keg, is a unique skill that allows Gangplank to place barrels on the battlefield. These barrels can be detonated by Gangplank or his allies, dealing area-of-effect damage and slowing enemies hit. This ability provides Gangplank with excellent zoning and crowd control potential, making him a valuable asset in team fights.

Finally, Gangplank's ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship onto a targeted area. This global ability can be used to assist allies in other lanes or disrupt enemies during crucial moments. It provides Gangplank with map-wide presence and allows him to influence the outcome of battles even from afar.

Gangplank's story within the League of Legends universe is one of treachery, revenge, and redemption. Once the feared ruler of Bilgewater, Gangplank was overthrown by his own crew and left for dead. However, he managed to survive and returned to reclaim his throne, seeking vengeance on those who betrayed him.

Throughout his journey, Gangplank faced numerous challenges and encountered various champions from the League of Legends roster. He formed alliances, made enemies, and ultimately solidified his position as the undisputed ruler of Bilgewater. His story is a testament to his resilience and determination, as well as his cunning and strategic prowess.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Gangplank's appearances, including the Sailor Gangplank skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic pirate look or prefer the dashing sailor aesthetic, Gangplank offers a thrilling and engaging gameplay experience that is sure to captivate players of all skill levels.

So, set sail with Gangplank and embark on a grand adventure filled with plunder, glory, and the thrill of the high seas. Whether you choose to don the Sailor Gangplank skin or explore his other appearances, you're bound to have an unforgettable experience with this iconic champion.

Now, let's delve into the story of Gangplank and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game.

The Story of Gangplank

Gangplank's story is one of treachery, revenge, and the pursuit of power. Hailing from the lawless port city of Bilgewater, Gangplank rose to prominence as the captain of the dread pirate ship, the Dead Pool. Known for his brutal raids and merciless nature, Gangplank quickly became a feared figure in the criminal underworld.

However, his reign of terror was challenged when Miss Fortune, a rival pirate, orchestrated a mutiny against him. Left for dead and betrayed by his own crew, Gangplank was consumed by a burning desire for revenge. He returned to Bilgewater, vowing to reclaim his throne and exact vengeance on those who had wronged him.

Gangplank's abilities in the game reflect his pirate background and his ruthless nature. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, allows him to set his enemies ablaze with his attacks, dealing bonus damage over time. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot a bullet from his pistol, dealing damage and potentially granting him bonus gold if it kills the target.

One of Gangplank's most iconic abilities is his W ability, Remove Scurvy. With this ability, Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, instantly removing any crowd control effects and healing himself. This ability showcases Gangplank's resourcefulness and ability to adapt to any situation.

Gangplank's ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, is a devastating long-range attack that rains down cannonballs on a targeted area. This ability not only deals damage but also slows enemies caught in its radius, making it a powerful tool for controlling the battlefield and turning the tide of a fight.

In the game, Gangplank is primarily played in the top lane or as a jungler. His versatile kit allows him to excel in both solo engagements and team fights. With his high damage output, crowd control removal, and global ultimate, Gangplank can be a formidable force in the hands of a skilled player.

Despite his strengths, Gangplank does have weaknesses. He is relatively squishy compared to other top lane champions, making him vulnerable to burst damage. Additionally, his abilities have high mana costs, requiring careful resource management to maximize his effectiveness in prolonged engagements.

In conclusion, Gangplank's

skin offers players a visually stunning and thematic transformation for the champion. With its unique design and new visual effects, this skin adds a fresh and exciting element to Gangplank's gameplay. Whether you're a fan of his pirate persona or prefer the modern military aesthetic, the

skin is a must-have for any Gangplank enthusiast.

skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this legendary champion.

Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is known for his ruthless nature and his thirst for power on the high seas. However, even the most fearsome pirates need a break from their plundering adventures. That's where Pool Party Gangplank comes in, offering a refreshing and lighthearted twist to this notorious champion.

Released on July 29, 2015, Pool Party Gangplank is a skin that brings a whole new level of fun to the champion. With his trusty cutlass replaced by a water gun and his iconic pirate hat swapped for a beach hat, Gangplank is ready to hit the beach and enjoy some summer vibes. This skin is available for purchase at a cost of 1350 RP, allowing players to transform Gangplank into the ultimate pool party pirate.

Pool Party Gangplank features a variety of unique visual and audio effects that perfectly capture the essence of a beach-themed adventure. His water gun replaces his pistol, shooting out streams of water with each attack. His barrels are transformed into colorful beach balls, exploding with a splash of water upon detonation. Even his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, rains down beach umbrellas instead of cannonballs, creating a playful and whimsical atmosphere.

But the fun doesn't stop there. Pool Party Gangplank also comes with new recall animation, where he sets up a beach umbrella and relaxes in a beach chair while sipping a refreshing drink. This skin truly embodies the spirit of summer and adds a touch of humor to Gangplank's otherwise serious persona.

Now, let's take a step back and delve into the story of Gangplank himself. As one of the original champions in League of Legends, Gangplank has a rich history within the game. Hailing from Bilgewater, a lawless port city, Gangplank rose to power as the leader of the brutal gang known as the Dreadnova. With his cunning and ruthless nature, he became the undisputed king of the high seas, terrorizing both friend and foe.

Gangplank's abilities in the game reflect his pirate nature. His passive ability, Trial by Fire, allows him to set his enemies ablaze with his attacks. His Q ability, Parrrley, allows him to shoot his target with his pistol, dealing bonus damage and potentially granting him extra gold. His W ability, Remove Scurvy, allows him to cleanse himself of any crowd control effects and heal a portion of his missing health. His E ability, Powder Keg, allows him to place barrels that can be detonated, dealing area of effect damage and slowing enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Cannon Barrage, calls down a barrage of cannonballs from his ship, damaging and slowing enemies within the area.

While Gangplank is a formidable champion, he does have his weaknesses. He lacks mobility compared to some other champions, making him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Additionally, his abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. However, in the hands of a skilled player, Gangplank can be a force to be reckoned with, dealing massive damage and controlling the battlefield with his explosive barrels.

Gangplank's story within the game has seen its fair share of twists and turns. In the Bilgewater event, Gangplank was seemingly killed by his rival, Miss Fortune, and the city celebrated his demise. However, it was later revealed that Gangplank had survived and returned to reclaim his throne. This event led to the creation of the Pool Party Gangplank skin, showcasing a more lighthearted side of the character.
